answers.answer: Hello,I cannot confirm anything without examination but itching on knuckles can be due to contact dermatitis,atopic dermatitis,xerotic eczema,systemic diseases like liver disease,biliary disease,diabetes or peripheral nerve damage.A consultation of a dermatologist will be the best.Hope it helps. Take care and pls do keep me posted on how you are doing or in case you have additional queries. Kind regards.
